turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one pizza, I would like extra cheese, pepperoni, bacon,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pineapple. On the other two, I would like extra cheese, sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ham I'm sorry, not ham. Canadian bacon, bell peppers, and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 medium pizzas, 1 pepperoni, bacon, pineapple, and extra cheese, and the other 2 extra cheese, sausage, canadian bacon, bellpeppers, and mushrooms, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. On all the pizzas, I need gluten-free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that, that will increase your total to $60, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery,or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick-up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent, thank.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, we have done quite well. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. You too.
